synopsis.text: Umetaro Nozaki, a high school student and secret shoujo manga artist, is the object of affection for his classmate, Chiyo Sakura. When she confesses her feelings to him, Nozaki mistakes her for a fan and offers her a job as his assistant instead of a date. As they work together on his manga, "Let's Love," Sakura befriends Nozaki's eccentric acquaintances who serve as inspiration for his characters. Despite Nozaki's cluelessness about her true feelings, Sakura remains determined to get closer to him and help him with his manga. This romantic comedy follows the hijinks and misunderstandings that ensue as Sakura navigates the world of shoujo manga and tries to win over her crush.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
